content: free pattern dog keychain @abelya toys varvara nazarova materials yarn yarnart jeans beige color #07 160g/50m yarnart jeans white color #01 160g/50m you can use other yarn of the same thickness you will also need stuffing i used holofiber hook number 2 two 6 mm black eyes that can be sewn or glued superglue optional black mouliné thread for embroidering the nose yarn needle marker or marking thread optional scissors keychain base optional stitches used and abbreviations magic_ring - magic_ring single_crochet - single_crochet increase - increase increase decrease - decrease slip_stitch - slip_stitch f/o - fasten_off … х repeat the pattern x amount of times work in continuous spiral do not join your work at the end of the rounds i crochet without offset loops this pattern describes a toy that is 1 6 inch 4 cm tall depending on hook size crocheting density and yarn thickness toy can be used as a keychain or a car hanging so let s get started i wish you enjoy crocheting @abelya toys head white color 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 2 increase x6 12 3 1 single_crochet increase x6 18 4 1 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet increase х5 1 single_crochet 24 5 3 single_crochet increase х6 30 6 2 single_crochet increase 4 single_crochet increase х5 2 single_crochet 36 7 5 single_crochet increase х6 42 8 single_crochet around 42 9 5 single_crochet decrease х6 36 10 2 single_crochet decrease 4 single_crochet decrease х5 2 single_crochet 30 11 3 single_crochet decrease х6 24 12 1 single_crochet decrease 2 single_crochet decrease х5 1 single_crochet 18 stuffing the head firmly 13 1 single_crochet decrease x6 12 14 6 decrease leave the long tail of the yarn if you want to make a car hanging if you want to make a keychain leave the short tail of the yarn close the hole see photo → if you want to make a keychain f/o and cut the yarn if you want to make a car hanging pull the yarn into the top of the circle and crochet a chain about 18 9 inches 48 cm long fasten_off invisibly and weave in end see photo↓ @abelya toys ears white and beige colors 1 4 single_crochet in a magic_ring 4 2 increase x4 8 3 3 single_crochet increase х2 10 4 single_crochet around 10 5 8 single_crochet 2 increase 12 6 10 single_crochet 2 increase 14 fold the ear in half 7 single_crochet f/o and leave a long strand of yarn spot beige color 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 2 increase x6 slip_stitch 12 f/o and leave a long strand of yarn assembling instructions sew the ears as you like fasten the end of the beige yarn in the place where you will sew the beige spot see photo↓ sew the beige spot working in flo see photo↑ sew or glue the eyes embroider the nose and mouth with black mouliné thread you can use other threads if you want to make a keychain attach the
